results.content: Great course! Easy, digestible chunks that break down and explain .css syntax and what to use when. And very applicable to the "real world" of web design and development.
results.content_html: Great course! Easy, digestible chunks that break down and explain .css syntax and what to use when. And very applicable to the "real world" of web design and development.

results.content: I didn't care of this course. I felt like it was pretty repetitive which several lessons. I found the voice to be kind of annoying and the amount of type-os were excessive. Can't say that I learned any cool tricks that were outside of very basic code. This course really didn't do much for me. :(

results.content: Hector is very talanted instructor. Not only he's structured his tutorial in a great way, but also included all the common issues you may face with as a developer, no matter what your level of expertise is.

results.content: Great HTML5 course with a lot of practical examples!

results.content: Once again, I am really impressed at how much the instructor knows about the subject, very clear description and logical to understand and absorb.
